headline: UBS Lifts Ralph Lauren (RL) Price Target, Keeps Buy Rating
summary: On Friday, May 23, UBS analyst Jay Sole raised the price target on Ralph Lauren Corporation (NYSE:RL) from $335 to $384 and maintained a “Buy” rating. This change comes after the company’s recent Q4 fiscal 2025 earnings report, which Sole sees as a reason to have an improved outlook on the company’s performance over the […]
